Uk Online Bank Em Is Em Accessible

02 Dec 2000

Surprising though it may be, having watched\nSmile et al fail to meet even basic\naccessibility requirements, Intelligent\nFinance, the Halifax's eBank, have used the five months delay\nin launching their online service to show that:

\n
    \n
  1. \n It actually has an interest in meeting the requirements\n of the Disability Discrimination Act;\n
    2. \n
  2. \n It's not too hard to do something about it.\n
    3. \n
\n

Why can't all banks work like this?
